TITLE: Collaborative Teaching
DEF: Educators working together to design, deliver, and evaluate instruction
TASK: The Collaborative Teaching pattern helps to involves educators working collectively to design, deliver, and assess instruction. For efficient implementation, promote open communication, expertise and resource sharing, and clearly define roles and responsibilities. This encourages a co-creative environment that can continuously refine teaching practices, leading to improved student outcomes. Challenges lie in overcoming interpersonal issues, coordinating efforts, and maintaining balanced contributions from all parties.
